ygData.subject: Re: Twisting
ygData.msgSnippet: Look at your chat options in the options setup screen - you can turn off many levels of chatter and messages - see if there are any you can do without and it
ygData.messageBody:
Look at your chat options in the options setup screen - you can turn off
many levels of chatter and messages - see if there are any you can do
without and it may help your screen spam.

Sylly.

-----Original Message-----
From: Schafer, Timothy L 1425
[mailto:Timothy.Schafer@...]
Sent: Wednesday, July 07, 1999 5:21 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Twisting

From: "Schafer, Timothy L 1425"
<Timothy.Schafer@...>

does it), B) the messages that bards spam in the chat window
gets so
annoying, and hard to read, I miss a lot of important
messages from friends
and party members.
